name: mfe-v1
description: Micro-frontend architecture with configuration-driven app shell

scripts.build:shared: pnpm --filter @mfe/types build && pnpm --filter @mfe/react-shared build && pnpm --filter @mfe/angular-shared build
scripts.build:mfes: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:shell && pnpm build:header && pnpm build:footer && pnpm build:dashboard-sidebar && pnpm build:dashboard-landing && pnpm build:hotlists-sidebar && pnpm build:hotlists-dashboard
scripts.dev:mfes: concurrently -n shell,header,footer,dash-side,dash-land,hot-side,hot-dash -c blue,cyan,magenta,green,yellow,red,white "pnpm --filter mfe-shell dev" "pnpm --filter common-header dev" "pnpm --filter common-footer dev" "pnpm --filter dashboard-sidebar dev" "pnpm --filter dashboard-landing dev" "pnpm --filter hotlists-sidebar dev" "pnpm --filter hotlists-dashboard dev"
scripts.dev:dashboard: concurrently -n config,gateway -c cyan,green "MODE=dashboard pnpm dev:config" "MODE=dashboard pnpm dev:gateway"
scripts.dev:hotlists: concurrently -n config,gateway -c cyan,green "MODE=hotlists pnpm dev:config" "MODE=hotlists pnpm dev:gateway"
scripts.dev:gateway: concurrently -n docker,watcher -c green,yellow "docker compose up" "node nginx-reload-watcher.js"
